casebody.data:
Victor VIVAUDOU, Plaintiff-Respondent-Appellant, v. Charles G. GUTH, Defendant-Appellant-Respondent. No. 60. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 5, 1934. Joseph Dannenberg, of New York City (Julius M. Arnstein, of New York City, on the brief), for plaintiff. O’Brien, Driscoll & Raf tery, of New York City (Arthur E. Driscoll, and Benjamin Pepper, both of New York City, of counsel), for defendant.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
